text: tatha unehen aadam ke do putron ka sahee samaachaar[1] suna do, jab donon ne ek upaayan (qurbaanee) prastut kee, to ek se sveekaar kee gaee tatha doosare se sveekaar nahin kee gaee. us (doosare) ne kahaah main avashy teree hatya kar doonga. us (pratham) ne kahaah allaah aagyaakaaron hee se sveekaar karata hai
